lessons.english: The rain shows no sign of stopping.
Dark clouds are a sign of rain.

lessons.japanese: まだ目にみえる春の兆しはなかった。
lessons.english: There were still no visual signs of spring.

lessons.japanese: それらはその地震の前兆だった。
lessons.english: They were symptoms of the earthquake.

lessons.japanese: その両国間に緊張が高まりつつある兆しがある。
lessons.english: There are signs of growing tensions between the two countries.

lessons.japanese: その建物は老朽化の兆しを見せている。
lessons.english: The building exhibits signs of dilapidation.

lessons.japanese: 全ての兆候は彼女が回復しているということだ。
lessons.english: All the signs are that she is getting better.

lessons.japanese: この報道は何の前兆だろうか。

lessons.english: This wind is a sign of a storm.

lessons.japanese: 労働力不足の発生は経済の過熱兆候と見られている。
lessons.english: The emerging labor shortage is viewed as a sign of economic overheating.

lessons.japanese: 彼は糖尿病のどんな兆しにも注意していた。
lessons.english: He was watchful for any sign of diabetes.
